snippet: General Manager Brian Cashman, seeking more catching depth, traded for Chris Stewart, the San Francisco Giants backup catcher, and optioned Francisco Cervelli to Class AAA Empire State.
abstract: New York Yankees, seeking more depth at catcher, unexpectedly trade for San Francisco Giants backup Chris Stewart, and send backup Francisco Cervelli to the minors.
lead_paragraph: General Manager Brian Cashman, seeking more catching depth, traded for Chris Stewart, the San Francisco Giants backup catcher, and optioned Francisco Cervelli to Class AAA Empire State.

headline.seo: Yankees Trade for a Catcher and Send Cervelli to the Minors
headline.main: Yankees Unexpectedly Trade for a Catcher and Send Cervelli to the Minors
headline.print_headline: Yankees Unexpectedly Trade for a Catcher and Send Cervelli to the Minors
